questions.question: What approach adapts layouts to different screen sizes?
questions.explanation: Responsive design creates layouts that adapt to various devices.

questions.question: Which CSS feature applies styles based on device characteristics?
questions.explanation: Media queries adjust styles based on screen properties.

questions.question: What meta tag controls viewport behavior on mobile?
questions.explanation: The viewport meta tag controls mobile display scaling.

questions.question: What unit is relative to viewport width?
questions.explanation: vw represents a percentage of viewport width.

questions.question: Which layout model simplifies responsive design?
questions.explanation: Flexbox creates flexible, responsive layouts easily.

questions.question: What approach designs for mobile devices first?
questions.explanation: Mobile-first design starts with mobile layouts.

questions.question: Which property makes images scale with containers?
What CSS Grid property creates responsive columns?
What CSS function adjusts values between breakpoints?
questions.explanation: clamp sets responsive min, ideal, and max values.
